Title: U.S. Census Bureau OnTheMap
Detailed Description of Data: Data provided by the U.S. Census Bureau allows users to select cities and counties. This data from the Census Bureua allows a user do get an idea of the average distance the population of Santa Clara County lives relative to their work and vice versa. Sample data from this location shows 48% of the population in Santa Clara County lives less than 10 miles from their place of work. Filters are available such as age-range/salary range/etc.
Description of How Data Was Collected: This data was collected from the OnTheMap application provided by the U.S. Census Bureau

Agency: Data provided by SPUR. This data from SPUR compares data between VTA efficiency
Title: costs

Agency: Data provied by the U.S Census Bureau allows users to locate employment
Title: occupations
